description:
Lady Kayura, an overwhelmingly powerful demon from the netherworld, appears and mocks Toma and Ryo over the capture of Seiji, Shin, and Shu. During the battle to lure the remaining two Troopers into the netherworld, a certain staff appears.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Lady Kayura and the Dark Realm
Nazo no Onna Youja Kayura Shutsugen
謎の女妖邪カユラ出現
